message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.MM

The paper proposes a method for word spotting in natural scene images using character probability maps and convolutional neural networks. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. The use of dynamic time warping for scoring also suggests a machine learning (cs.LG) component. Additionally, the paper involves text recognition (cs.CL) and multimedia (cs.MM) as it deals with egocentric camera streams.
